FIRMWARE UPDATE

You are about to update the firmware on your device.
Please select a firmware file from your local hard drive and click the Update Firmware button.

Warnings:
  • Do not power off the device during the update.
  • If everything goes well, the device will restart automatically.
  • You can upload any file, so ensure you choose the correct firmware image for your device.
  • Supports OpenWRT 'factory' and JD Cloud formats.
Version: 24.05.19
